groovyx.net.http.optional

Class Csv

  • java.lang.Object
    • groovyx.net.http.optional.Csv

  • public class Csv
extends java.lang.Object

    Optional CSV encoder/parser implementation based on the [OpenCSV](http://opencsv.sourceforge.net/) library. It will be available when the OpenCsv library is on the classpath (an optional dependency).

        Parameters:
        config - the configuration
        fromServer - the server content accessor
        Returns:
        the parsed object

        Used to encode the request content using the OpenCsv writer.

        ts - the server request content accessor

      • toCsv

        public static void toCsv(HttpConfig delegate,
                         java.lang.String contentType,
                         java.lang.Character separator,
                         java.lang.Character quote)

        Used to configure the OpenCsv encoder/parser in the configuration context for the specified content type.

        Parameters:
        delegate - the configuration object
        contentType - the content type to be registered
        separator - the CSV column separator character
        quote - the CSV quote character

      • toCsv

        public static void toCsv(HttpConfig delegate,
                         char separator)

        Used to configure the OpenCsv encoder/parser in the configuration context for the text/csv content-type. No quote character will be provided.

        Parameters:
        delegate - the configuration object
        separator - the CSV column separator character

      • toCsv

        public static void toCsv(HttpConfig delegate,
                         char separator,
                         char quote)

        Used to configure the OpenCsv encoder/parser in the configuration context for the text/csv content-type.

        Parameters:
        delegate - the configuration object
        separator - the CSV column separator character
        quote - the CSV quote character

      • toTsv

        public static void toTsv(HttpConfig delegate,
                         char quote)

        Used to configure the OpenCsv encoder/parser in the configuration context for the text/tab-separated-values content type, with a tab as the column separator character.

        Parameters:
        delegate - the configuration object
        quote - the quote character to be used
